snippet: A 560-page biography about Roger Ailes being published this month aims to be an exhaustive look at the television executive’s life and monumental career.
abstract: Book The Loudest Voice in the Room by Gabriel Sherman, 560-page biography about Fox News Channel chairman Roger Ailes being published in January, aims to be exhaustive look at the television executive’s life and monumental career; book, in months before publication, has drawn sharp criticism from chorus of people connected to Fox News.

byline.original: By JULIE BOSMAN and BILL CARTER
